name: Patient Zero (Big Three Games)
description:
Patient Zero was created for the one-week Community Game Jam - https://itch.io/jam/cgj. It's story is about a militar veteran trying to understand his life talking to a psychologist. Your role is to choose his path and decide his destiny. Everything present in the game was created by us, Big Three Games, except for the font - https://www.dafont.com/pt/cheeseburger.font

Theme

As the game was made for the Community Game Jam, we had to follow the theme: THE GAME IS A LIAR. To understand how our game fits into it, it's important to pay attention to the psychologist.
